abstract: Vale S.A. of Brazil said Friday that it was in talks to buy Bunge Ltd.’s Brazilian fertilizer operations for as much as $3.8 billion.
snippet: Vale S.A. of Brazil said Friday that it was in talks to buy Bunge Ltd.’s Brazilian fertilizer operations for as much as $3.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Vale S.A. said Friday that it was in talks to buy Bunge Ltd.’s fertilizer operations in Brazil for as much as $3.8 billion as that country, the world’s biggest producer of coffee, sugar and orange juice, seeks to cut its dependency on crop-nutrient imports.

headline.main: Vale in Talks to Buy Fertilizer Assets in Brazil
